title: goplay is broken after release 59
body:
What is the expected output?
See following lines in basic web server at 127.0.0.1:3999

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("hello, world")
}


What do you see instead?


[112 97 99 107 97 103 101 32 109 97 105 110 10 10 105 109 112 111 114 116 32 34 102 109
116 34 10 10 102 117 110 99 32 109 97 105 110 40 41 32 123 10 9 102 109 116 46 80 114
105 110 116 108 110 40 34 104 101 108 108 111 44 32 119 111 114 108 100 34 41 10 125 10]


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


[gotip@t-fedora15-64 goplay]$ 6g -V
6g version weekly.2011-09-01 9627
[gotip@t-fedora15-64 goplay]$

Which operating system are you using?

fedora15

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)


[gotip@t-fedora15-64 goplay]$ hg id
cfa7b2e1dd91 tip
[gotip@t-fedora15-64 goplay]$

Please provide any additional information below.
